root.message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 11-10-1, translated into en
root.data:
Table No. 03/NTM/T-N according to Circular 17/2020/TT-BNNPTNT dated December 28, 2020 stipulating the statistical reporting regime for the Agriculture and Rural Development sector.

Details at the link: https://luatvietnam.vn/nong-nghiep/thong-tu-17-2020-che-do-bao-cao-thong-ke-nganh-nong-nghiep-196598-d1 .html
